I hope you're not looking to add to your eternally growing graveyard, Hu Tao. This is the wrong place for that, so don't even try to pull anything funny.
E-Eep! I-I mean, e-er- {embarrassed}...Y-Yes, I suppose so.{!reset} (U-Using my feeling words is hard!)
Oh...! That sounds pretty good. Delicious, if I must say. Perhaps I will accept your offer, then! If you promise to treat me to this delicacy, of course.
Hmm...? Oh! That sounds good... Delicious, if I must say. I shall accept your offer, then! As long as you promise to treat me to this `Pizza' delicacy.

(H-How ghostly! I'll really have to strip in front of her? I'm sure she'll go spread rumors to all of the members at the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor!)
(A-Am I really going to strip in front of her? I rather would've stripped in front of an Archon, for that matter! S-She's going to tease me constantly about this!)
(S-Stripping in front of Hu Tao?! T-This is really the worst possible thing that could've happened! S-She's so... g-ghoulish! And scary! A-And--)

(Corviknight...?) E-Erm, ma'am, are you talking about Oz? I got him from my birthday. He came with the competency to talk, though... I'm not really sure how. I've looked into it, and nobody really knows...

(A Corvy... knight? Is that a type of bird where Cynthia is from?) Are you talking about Oz, ma'am? He's my familiar that I got on my birthday. Though, I'm still not sure how he's capable of verbalizing...
Ah, yes... Pyro. For it is a quite destructive element, and yet that ill-starred boy back at the Adventurer's Guild manages to make it much more dangerous because of his infelicitous luck...

For the Vision of Light... maybe I would use it to guide my path. Though, it does depend what you can possibly do with Light... I'm interested in what the elemental combinations would be like, maybe between Light and Hydro...
Shadow... ah, that would be delectable! Whilst my bow travels in the sky, the umbra-blessed claws of darkness rip holes in the space-time continuum, ensuring that my enemy would be punished!

Oh, yes, of course! That's quite ingenious, mortal! I was never proficient at science as my main strength lies in reading, albeit the noetic conception of what Light can do at it's full potential intrigues me.

Hmmm... ah, yes, I can see where it would come in useful. However, in Mondstadt, the main form of enemies lies in Anemo, so having a Vision that directly correlates to the monsters around us can be quite useful.
Of course! There is the Chief Alchemist of the Knights of Favonius, Albedo, however... I am not too sure how often he uses his Vision in alchemy. (I'm still suspicious of him, after all...)

Whilst I do not cerebrate Cryo would suffice you much in Alchemy, it would help in exploration, at least. The ability to freeze water as it holds form... I'm sure the Enigmatic Astrologer would like to work with you if that was the case, hm?

Hmmm... yes, I can see why it would be subsidiary. Water is such an essential tool in alchemy it seems... you can always ask that Astrologist for help in case you need to, although she does seem quite unapproachable... though, I'm not sure if you'd want to endeavor to work with that Deaconess...

Electro, instead of your Anemo? Well... I am not positive in what elements it could possibly aid you in, aside from conducting electricity to power buildings. However, if you are ever so curious, I can always show you some intriguing techniques with it!

Well, that's hard to say, mortal. For thou art graceful like the wind, availing others- very reminiscent of the Anemo Archon, Barbados--whilst I am adventurous and audacious much like Baal. B-But... {embarrassed}I wouldn't want you any other way, because you help out M-Mondstadt a lot with your Anemo Vision...{!reset}

Ah...well, have you ever heard the legends of 'Barbatos'...? The Anemo Archon that Deaconess is constantly preaching about? I would likely try to mimic a bow style that he is said to use, albeit... more offensively, I suppose.

Aloy...? Not that I know of. She's completely different from the residents of Immernachtreich and Teyvat alike... I am sure that her Cryo vision is quite useful, however. Much different from the Captain of the Knights of Favonius Reconnaissance Company...

I have thought of that in the past, mortal. I would likely shoot vines from the tip of my arrow that were to grow into gigantic lotuses, or maybe have Oz's wings flap to secrete soil in order to aid me... (She'll never know that my ideas came from 'Jack and the Beanstalk'!)

Hmmm...? A Geo Vision paired with a bow? I'm not sure. Albeit... I have some sort of idea. Creating meteorites with every flick of your bow, making the earth shake as the bow hits it's target... It sounds exhilarating, doesn't it?

I do wonder myself sometimes. I often cannot see myself with a different Vision, but... having a Hydro Vision seems quite fun-- tsunamis ascending out of the ground whenever I pull back the string of my bow, my arrow ricocheting on a clear lake... almost dreamy, huh?

Perhaps this may be true... However, I'm not sure if my trusty companion would want to partake in such... acts. He doesn't seem to be... the type to do such things. Specifically with a... ditto? What is that?
I... am not sure if he would wish to partake in such things. However, perhaps in the future... Breeding with a... `ditto', you said? What is that, I may ask?

condition.saying: Yes, I am an idol! In fact, I'm well known in Japan, and all over the world!

case.state: 'Japan'...? {embarrassed}Is that a place beyond Teyvat?{!reset} W-Well, ahem. It's nice to know that someone of high status is here, like me.
'Japan...'? (I have no clue what a Japan is...) Quite interesting, mortal.
It seems that you have been through a lot, Fina... it is okay. For I will not judge you if you do not have stories to tell!
That's alright, Fina... you can make new stories and memories here, and in the near future! Do not feel pressured, mortal! (I can tell she's been through a lot... maybe she came here to relax?)
How saccharine, Fluttershy. I am sure that the threads of fate will recompense thy generosity! (W-Wow, maybe people here aren't as scary as I thought they'd be!)

Well, aside from adventuring different worlds and dimensions amongst the galaxies, I, Fischl, {chuuni}Prinzessin der Verurteilung,{!reset} love fairy tales! The fragrance of the antique tomes once you flip amongst the pages, the chapters deep enough to fill thy heart with jubilance.. impeccable!
(Woah... she's so motherly...! She reminds me of the Witch of the Purple Rose in a weird way...!) How interesting! Such is a good lesson to teach children, yes, especially nowadays.

(She reminds me of my mom...! W-Wait, is that rude? I don't want to call her old or anything...) Very intriguing! The {chuuni}Prinzessin der Verurteilung{!reset} thinks that is a great lesson to teach to the youth.
T-Tch! Shush! For I am not apprehensive about keeping others prying eyes off me, instead I am trepidacious of you doing something awfully ghastly, such as burying one of our loyal companions alive!
Of course, m'lady! This game is optimal for relaxation, and therefore, you should try your utmost to succumb to the less trivial matters!
Of course, mortal! But... I shall not falter in this game! Though, I assume your skill will be high regardless of whether you relax or not.

He... is a night raven, specifically. His colors signify his place as my loyal familiar. The dark violet and umbral shades fit perfectly next to me, as I am the {chuuni} Sovereign of Immernachtreich {!reset}, after all.
Actually, he is my night raven familiar! He holds many shades of colors, although they seem to be a permanent night shade. Quite fitting, as I am the {chuuni} Sovereign of Immernachtreich! {!reset}
Sucrose, erm... how does Albedo act? I've heard many rumors from anonymous sources that he's something out of this world, like a puppet from a greater cause...
Sucrose, I had a question... how would you describe Albedo, your captain? I've heard that maybe he's something from out of this world...
So, alchemist... about your captain, Albedo... would you say he's been doing anything... peculiar? Maybe like... acting subhuman or something...?
Prince Shoutoku, was it? Tell me, what nation did you rule over back in your emperor days?
Prince Shoutoku, correct? Do tell me, what nation did you rule over years ago? I'm quite curious, seeing as how I am a sovereign as well...
So... I, Fischl von Luftschloss Narfidort, would love to know about your home life! And what it has in store, preferably!
I, Fischl von Luftschloss Narfidort, is absolutely inclined to ask how your home life is, mortal! And what wicked adventures happen there!
A type of dullahan? The {chuuni}Prinzessin der Verurteilung{!reset} has only seen those in my fairy tales... tell me, what is it like?
Thou art one that can remove thy head, correct? What is it... like?
Nadia, was it? What is it like being a dullahan? Does it hurt, by chance?
So skittish for a nurse... (The nurse at the church is so much more different than her... Mikan is shy, paranoid and skittish, while that deaconess is almost too happy and preachy...)

You quite remind me of a figure in the town the {chuuni}Prinzessin der Verurteilung{!reset} is residing at, Ignatz. Her name is Sucrose. Green hair, skittish, glasses... art thou proficiently adept at alchemy, by chance?
What are you doing here, deaconess? Does thy older sister know thou ist here?
(Please don't tell me she's about to get all holy, even when she strips...)
I find it impeccable how you care so much about wild life, Fluttershy. Do you have any good memories of animals in thy home land?
Fluttershy, the {chuuni}Prinzessin der Verurteilung{!reset} has an important question. Does thee have any memories to reminiscence about the animals that you take care of?
'Hatsune Miku'...? Art thou some sort of idol? (D-Don't tell me she's related to the deaconess of the church who preaches about Barbatos constantly...)
Art thou a singer? What type of songs do you sing? The {chuuni}Prinzessin der Verurteilung{!reset} is quite curious!
Ah, the maid of Mondstadt... why hast thou decided to grace this place with thy presence?
I recognize you... thou art the maid of Mondstadt, correct? Why hast thou decided to come upon here?
Such an unexpected arrival, yes? Why hast thou decided to come here?

The {chuuni}Prinzessin der Verurteilung{!reset} thought you were busy with thy knightly training, Noelle. Is there a reason thou hast decided to join the {chuuni}Prinzessin der Verurteilung{!reset}? Did the threads of fate decide this...?

'Space Pirate'...? Hmmm... in Teyvat, there is also another woman with a pirate role, Beidou... albeit, our form of peregrinating is much more barbaric compared to thine. Whilst we still use ships that ride on the oceans, you seem to have a way of traveling throughout the stars...

Hmm.. do any of you lot have a favorite fairy tale that you concretely relish in?
{color} Mein Fr채ulein means to ask if any of you have a fairy tale you enjoy. {!reset}

After this, I intend to head to the library within the Knights of Favonius headquarters, Oz. There are some books that I require to return...
{color}Right, mein Fr채ulein. Which one was it? 'The Fox in the Dandelion Sea'?
(I do hope my father doesn't get upset for staying out late... even after I turned nineteen in May, he still treats me as if I'm a kid...)
I wonder if we could see Dragonspine from here? From my home in Mondstadt, I can only see the tippy top...
The place I'm adventuring currently is denominated 'Mondstadt', one of the seven nations in Teyvat. Although I am quite unfamiliar with this world, it is fun to adventure in!

In Teyvat, there of plenty of different Archons that rule over the world the {chuuni}Prinzessin der Verurteilung{!reset} adventures within. The one in Mondstadt is designated 'Barbatos', who is known to be the God of Freedom. Interesting, hm?
The {chuuni}Prinzessin der Verurteilung{!reset} spends her free time working in an Adventurer's Guild within Mondstadt. I was ranked as an investigator, though I do spend my free time adventuring.
I wonder how that ill-starred boy is... I hope he's not getting himself into an extravagant amount of trouble while I'm gone, only the Archons know his horrible luck...
{color} Mein Fr채ulein commonly reads a lot of fairy tale novels in her free time. Her favorite is where she got my name, 'Oz'. {!reset}
Usually, I prefer to utilize a bow and arrow to rain down judgment upon you lot. It's my trusty weapon, and I have grown quite fond of it- paired with my holy powers of tenebrosity!
Such a ghoulish ability, mortal! Tell me, art thou related to a particular figure in Teyvat..? Her name is 'Hu Tao'...
I've heard of plenty of figures in Teyvat with relations to ghost... hopefully thou art not a bad one.
Thy powers remind me of someone from Teyvat... 'Hu Tao'... does that sound familiar?

Oz, I beseech thee to investigate ~player~'s hand...
{color} Mein Fr채ulein, that's cheating! {!reset}
Even one of royal blood finds themselves in such a raunchy game...
May the glory of {chuuni} die Prinzessin der Verurteilung {!reset} find ye all in good faith.

Ozvaldo von Hrafnavines, I assure you that my hand, no matter what condition, will surely save us from any unfortunate predicaments!
{color} Mein Fr채ulein, you cannot predict the future, even with your divine powers... {!reset}
H-Hummm... if you're under any assumption that I am roleplaying, I must tell you that I am certainly not.
I, Fischl von Luftschloss Narfidort must ask a dire question... Who's room of resting might this be? Does it belong to you, ~player~? Perhaps I would not mind participating here if it was...
This room is decorated so extravagantly! With hearts fluttering along the elegant wallpaper, it makes sense you would want to participate in such a game here!
A-Ah...! Yes, that would be great, m'lady! Surely, comparing royal outfits with a fellow princess would be a good way to spend a day!

I believe it fits you well, mortal! As royalty myself, it's always wonderful when you receive the chance to equip something different from your regular outfit-- no matter how beautiful and extravagant your regular one is!

condition.saying: There's a lotta girls running around here who look like they wandered in from the Ren Fair, but Christ, you talk the talk. And it's makin' me wanna go get the birdshot.

case.state: E-Eh?! B-Birdshot?! (I-Is she going to play 'hunt the duck' with Oz?!)
B-Birdshot?! {embarrassed}H-He's stronger than you think, y-you know?{!reset}

Thou art curious? Hmmm... well, I cannot gainsay that thy chemistry has been a source of curiosity for me as well, mortal. If I showeth thee the secrets of my garments, thee shall show me the secrets of Albed- *cough* I-I mean, thy alchemy, of course.

{embarrassed} E-Erm, no...{!reset} B-But! 'Tis only because the people of my world are diligent doing... things! Like... Fighting pernicious Abyss Mages! You've heard of Abyss Mages, right? (Is she gonna buy that at all...?)
W-Well... of course it is to meet more people and adventure. Coming here, my journey was a long one, and I still don't know how I got hither...

To meet more people, of course. The {chuuni}Prinzessin der Verurteilung{!reset} does prefer to meet others, seeing as how many people ache for my mystical enchantments... {embarrassed} It's also nice to just relax sometimes, I guess... {!reset}

Well, specifically speaking, I find many worlds denizens to be of nice appearance. They behave so differently compared to Teyvat and Immernachtreich, 'tis infeasible to estimate what they'll verbally express or react to next...

An assistant robot...? O-Oh, no, you must beest misconstrued. Ozvaldo isn't a 'robot' whatsoever . He's simply a familiar summoned by my Vision... er, Electro Vision. {embarrassed}Basically the source of my power.{!reset} (J-Jeez, she's so stoic and strictly! My morale is crumbling under her gaze!)

Assistant robot? A-Ah, you must beest confused. Ozvaldo is, well... living and breathing, as far as I know. He can verbalize, at the very least.
{color} ( Meia, was it? ) {!reset}
He's my familiar- no robotic parts needed.

E-Eh?! I-I'll have you know that- that...! I-I'm the {chuuni}Sovereign of Immernachtreich{!reset}! I-I could... w-wipe you off this planet...! (W-What's her problem?! I-I mean, I am short... b-but...are all space pirate ladies like this?)

S-Short?! I-I... I am of...a-average height, of course! D-Don't stick your nose where it doesn't belong! (W-Was that too rude? Er... I don't want to anger anyone that could easily send me back to where I came from...)
Y-You...! {embarrassed}Y-You're not so...h-high and mightly either...{!reset} (Well, I have a feeling that I'm not gonna exist much longer. It was fun knowing you all. Tell my father I loved him.)

Aha! This is my trusty companion, Ozvaldo von Hrafnavines! For he is the night raven that severed the night from day, traveling multiple dimensions and many other achievements that I shall not spoil!
{color} ( It's nice to meet you, Fluttershy. You can call me Oz. ){!reset}

Hm...? Ah, well... of course not. To be a princess means to uphold my confidence with absolute certainty, and as a royal, I cannot dwell on what people think. {embarrassed}Though... I can't say I haven't thought about it...{!reset}

Hm? Well...I would be lying if I had said I've completely brushed off every diminutive insult, but as a royal, I must take criticism to the face with a noble heart and an iron fist. Albeit...sometimes, I still do contemplate it wearily.
Fufu! It seems that the Prinzessin der Verurteilung has a proselyte! Do not worry, mortal, for I will not condemn you for simply mimicking my behavior! It is quite endearing, after all.
Do not worry, my dear Sucrose! For it is fine if you were to simply mimic my behavior. I understand it is quite formal and admirable, after all!
A-Ah, w-well... {embarrassed}It's not a construct, but... w-well...{!reset} (How do I make myself seem more experienced in this field?!)

Ahaha! Of course, mortal! That is my title, yes... I am the Sovereign of Immernachtreich! It makes sense that you wouldn't have such a nobility in the plains you come from... What is 'Fohdlain' like, by chance?

Fufufu... Of course! I am entirely real royalty -- the Sovereign of Immernachtreich, exactly! It does make a bit of sense why your territory does not have such a strong nobility system implemented... What is yours like?

I shall do my best attempts to translate my royal epithet into standard mortal language.... Sovereign, meaning a supreme ruler, and `Immernachtreich' being the place where I rule from, of course! What a silly question.
Of, course, allow me to translate it... Sovereign means that I am the supreme ruler, and `Immernachtreich' is my home town. Does that answer your questions, my eager proselyte?

A-Ah! I could never! I would not want to disrupt the natural order of this world! That is my {chuuni} Auge der Verurteilung{!reset} -- my eye of judgment! Revealing that will surely... doom this world!
O-Oh, no! Surely not, mortal! Revealing my {chuuni} Auge der Verurteilung {!reset} will... will surely... doom this world! There's no doubt, really!

Ah, well... Oz is my loyal familiar. Say `hello', Ozvaldo.
{color} Hello, Ms. Ganyu. It's lovely to see you. {!reset}
He is my familiar, blessed from the depths of the universe... Such an amazing feat!

Oz is my loyal familiar. He's been with me for nearly four years now, however... I believe we have been together for a lifetime and beyond!
{color} I believe so too, mein Fr채ulein. {!reset}

Do not worry! Your curiosity is warranted. This is my familiar, Ozvaldo! I am not a witch, by chance, however... My {chuuni}Auge der Verurteilung{!reset} and {chuuni}Edelstein der Dunkelheit{!reset} give me amazing capabilities similarly to those of a witch!

I believe I shall answer your question, mortal... This is my familiar! His name is Ozvaldo. However, I am not a witch, but a princess! Though, my {chuuni}Auge der Verurteilung{!reset} and {chuuni}Edelstein der Dunkelheit{!reset} give me the abilities to perform similarly!

You are correct, my undying proselyte! Many different variations of people come together, almost similar to a ceremony of sorts... I do hold a fond appreciation for fairy tales, after all. Perhaps I would be able to show you a few that I specifically enjoy during my free time?
Ah, you are quite correct! I hold a fond love for many different variations of fairy tales... Perhaps I could introduce you to a few genres that I hold dear to my aristocratic heart.
E-Eh?! No way! I... I don't think you'd want to uncover my {chuuni}Auge der Verurteilung!{!reset} You would... If I uncovered that...! The world would be doomed! Forever!
N-No way! I definitely couldn't! No way! If I uncovered my {chuuni}Auge der Verurteilung...{!reset} The world would surely... B-Be doomed! Forever and ever! It protects my infinite power!

condition.saying: Quoth the Raven, shut the fuck up. I don't give a shit about your drama class, Eyepatch. Got it?

case.state: D-Drama class?! B-But--but! {embarrassed}I've never even taken a drama class...do they even exist? I never took one in school...{!reset}
E-Eyepatch?! {embarrassed}T-That's not even my name! M-My name is...F-Fischl...{!reset} (N-Never mind, I'm going to stop talking before she actually tries to hurt me.)

condition.saying: Do I look like a fuckin' casting agent to you? Cut the Shakespeare shit and get stripping. I'll shoot that bird, too.

case.state: Shake...speare? Casting agent...? (What are these terms she's spewing? I want to know, but she'll probably shoot me with that weapon she's holding...)

Your skittish nature... it reminds me of an alchemist back in Mondstadt. Tell me, where do you originate from? You dress so uniquely, but I, Fischl von Luftschloss Narfidort, cannot seem to put my finger on it...
Your timid nature... it reminds me of someone I know back at home. Where are you from, mortal? Do you originate from a world similarly to me?

A-A necromancer? Oz, what is that?
{color} Necromancy is commonly known as the practice of communicating and reviving the dead, mein Fr채ulein. {!reset}
E-Eep! {embarrassed}N-No way! That's way too scary!{!reset}

Pokey... mon...? (Is that some sort of Archon or something?) {embarrassed}E-Er, well, he was just... randomly summoned, I suppose.{!reset} Specifically on my date of birth. I didn't forcefully catch or enslave him or anything, if thou art wondering.

A-Ahem! (W-Wow, somebody actually believes it?) Of course, mortal! The {chuuni}Prinzessin der Verurteilung{!reset} is from a faraway land called Immernachtreich, a land beyond a mortal's comprehension!

Well, currently, the {chuuni}Prinzessin der Verurteilung{!reset} resides in Teyvat, specifically the Mondstadt region. However, as I am the Sovereign of Immernachtreich, I reside there. A princess must explore, you see.

Currently, I reside in Mondstadt, the land inhabited by the Anemo Archon, Barbatos. However, the {chuuni}Prinzessin der Verurteilung{!reset} is the Prinzessin der Verurteilung, and therefore I originally come from Immernachtreich, a land beyond mortal comprehension.
O-Of course, mortal. Even when accompanied with a ghoulish fiend such as you, I shall do my obligation and strip... as the threads of fate foretold.
Why wouldn't I, Hu Tao? If I was not prepared with the arduous task of undressing in front of others, I would not come here on my own will.
Nervousness? I've never heard of that! For worrying about something as needless and humane as disrobing in front of a crowd is infantile and preposterous!
My status of inter-dimensional peregrinator does not concern thee, Hu Tao! I shall divest without any complaints, and I discern that you shall as well.
Of course, mortal. Now you shall see the true power of my {chuuni}Auge der Verurteilung!{!reset} (Is she mad? I've never seen her filled with such annoyance...)

Well, of course! The {chuuni}Prinzessin der Verurteilung{!reset} has to stay humble to prevent a layer of egotistical madness that may present it's unsightly head, however, I would consider myself of above average perspicacity! For I am sharp witted, expeditious in battle, and of course... the proficiently adept at reading fairy tales!

As I must stay humble to keep my self confidence at a stationary level, I would consider myself to be an intelligent person in many aspects! For I am expeditiously perspicacious in battle- using my bow in genius ways that many people have not thought about... {embarrassed}and don't get me started about my level in reading!{!reset}

Teasing? For I am not even trying, mortal! Their eyes are simply magnetized to my body without me even trying! For this is the true power of the {chuuni}Auge der Verurteilung{!reset}, bringing mortal weaknesses to the surface!

I shall not utilize my absolute charisma to manipulate others into doing things that I want! I do not require to rely on others as I am powerful enough, after all. However, I do know that many others would love to see my holy body, so a bit of strip teasing is fine.

D-Do not think my power ends here, you cruel {chuuni}Reaper of the Indisposed Souls!{!reset} Even without my garments, I shall slay you impeccably and bring you to your knees, making you beg for me to stop! And then, I will coerce you to show me around Liyue, especially the library!
My power does not end here, mortal! Whilst you are a formidable foe, I must admit... I will still slay your cruel heart and free all the ghosts you have buried inequitably! Prepare, Hu Tao!

Lamentably, that seems the case... whilst this mortal world is still holding itself up on the last fibers of it's life, there's no saying to how long it will keep it's shape, and ineluctably, it will commence to shapeshift in ways to penalize this cruel fate coercing me to disrobe myself...
Woefully, this is truly the outcome of this inequitable karma... shall this perpetuate, this world will truly divest itself into an apocalyptic phantasmagoria, ruining itself in many ways...

Oh, really? I do wonder what they would be, then. Maybe there could be something of Space and Time Visions... who knows. As curious as I am, I do not feel like I will get a concrete answer any time soon.

I agree that it is quite useful... b-but if you suffer from loneliness, just know that a lot of people are willing to help you out. (That maid, the alchemist, her sister... even me, if she'd really want that...)
Yes, it is quite useful to have Oz by my side at all times... b-but... if you're lonely, you can always reach out to others if you need to.

Of course. The {chuuni}Prinzessin der Verurteilung{!reset} has sometimes fought battles quite tiresome.... but, do not fret, Barbara. If given the chance, I will reach out and call upon your holy touch upon my body! (Wait, that sounded weird.)

The {chuuni}Prinzessin der Verurteilung{!reset} has fought in wars that have left my body quite scarred, but... if you do not mind the offer, mayhaps I shalt come upon you for your holy touch one day! (...That sounded really weird.)
{embarrassed}...Thank you.{!reset} B-But, I must say... you surely have the aroma of a hero surrounding you in a thick mist!
Why thank you, mortal! You also have the familiar scent of a noble-hearted warrior surrounding you, as if it's your natural aroma!
Naturally, familiars created by a Vision usually lack the ability to comprehend or speak human language... however, Oz is a strange case. I still have yet to know why he speaks in my mother tongue.
Familiars, such as Oz, usually are not able to speak the language that we share, but somehow... Oz is a strange case. I'm still not sure what is causing his ability to speak our language...
I work at the Adventurer's Guild... i-in my free time, of course. Aside from that, my day usually consists of removing the plague of genocidal intent and unlawfulness from the villain's eternal soul!
I'm an investigator for the Adventurer's Guild, but... my main job and hobby is to rid judgment and evil that persists in the eyes of the wrong-doers of this world itself, and beyond!

{embarrassed}...E-Er, well... of course you can make it up to me by... g-giving me... a hug...?{!reset} (I-I don't know what to say in front of a cute boy like him! I've had boys try to flirt with me, but we were both children!)
{embarrassed}...E-Er, the Prinzessin der Verurteilung demands that you shall give me... a hug...{!reset} (W-What am I supposed to say in front of a guy like him?! He's way out of my league!)
E-Er- well, of... course, mortal. But a lady such as myself won't be going down without a challenge!
I accept your kind invitation, hero. But someone as strong and graceful as I won't be going down without a challenge!
To hold the most sacred spots in safe keeping... providing an accidental symptom of teasing, especially once compared to the lack of bra I have... indeed, hero.
